channel.title: Help me finish this and explain clearly
channel.description:
Im leeching here because my friend said it was ok to leech his server.
Ok I downloaded Java Develemont Kit(JDK)6 update 14. And Java 6 update 14. Then I to the files double clicked compiler. It said
Note: Frame_Dub1.java uses or overrides a deprecated API Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for deatils Finished! Press Any key to continue.
Then I pressed any key.
Then after that I hit ctrl F then typed client then hit search. Went to client.java and hit ctrl f again then Searched for all the server names and changed them into the server name i wanted. Then clicked save as. Then I dragged the client.java into the run, didnt do anything, then i dragged compiler into run still nothing.
I am just stuck here please help.
And explain step by step not 1 thing then a thing thats like 10 steps away.

item.title: Help me finish this and explain clearly
item.dc:creator: @Eurolite Eurolite
item.description:
@Eurolite wrote:

After you edit the any .java file, you compile, so after you edit the names, compile. Then clsoe the compiler and click run.bat, there you go your server is up.

And this: [b]Note[/b]: Frame_Dub1.java uses or overrides a deprecated API [b]Note[/b]: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for deatils Finished! Press Any key to continue. Doesnâ€™t mean you got errors, because it says NOTE.

Read full topic
item.source: Help me finish this and explain clearly

item.title: Help me finish this and explain clearly
item.dc:creator: @Heveanlyrune Heveanlyrune
item.description:
@Heveanlyrune wrote:

Im leeching here because my friend said it was ok to leech his server.

Ok I downloaded Java Develemont Kit(JDK)6 update 14. And Java 6 update 14. Then I to the files double clicked compiler. It said

Note: Frame_Dub1.java uses or overrides a deprecated API
Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for deatils
Finished!
Press Any key to continue.

Then I pressed any key.

Then after that I hit ctrl F then typed client then hit search. Went to client.java and hit ctrl f again then Searched for all the server names and changed them into the server name i wanted. Then clicked save as. Then I dragged the client.java into the run, didnt do anything, then i dragged compiler into run still nothing.

I am just stuck here please help.

And explain step by step not 1 thing then a thing thats like 10 steps away.
